name: holophonix-animator-v2
description: Modern 3D sound animation system for Holophonix processors

scripts.electron:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development concurrently "npm run dev" "wait-on http://localhost:5173 && electron ."
scripts.build:electron: cross-env NODE_ENV=production ELECTRON_RETRY_DOWNLOAD=true ELECTRON_MIRROR_OPT_OUT=1 npm run build && electron-builder --publish always
scripts.build:win: cross-env NODE_ENV=production ELECTRON_RETRY_DOWNLOAD=true ELECTRON_MIRROR_OPT_OUT=1 npm run build && electron-builder --win --publish always
scripts.build:linux: cross-env NODE_ENV=production ELECTRON_RETRY_DOWNLOAD=true ELECTRON_MIRROR_OPT_OUT=1 npm run build && electron-builder --linux --publish always
scripts.build:mac: cross-env NODE_ENV=production ELECTRON_RETRY_DOWNLOAD=true ELECTRON_MIRROR_OPT_OUT=1 npm run build && electron-builder --mac --publish always
scripts.build:deb: cross-env NODE_ENV=production ELECTRON_RETRY_DOWNLOAD=true ELECTRON_MIRROR_OPT_OUT=1 npm run build && electron-builder --linux deb --publish always
scripts.build:appimage: cross-env NODE_ENV=production ELECTRON_RETRY_DOWNLOAD=true ELECTRON_MIRROR_OPT_OUT=1 npm run build && electron-builder --linux AppImage --publish always

linux.description: Modern 3D sound animation system for Holophonix processors
linux.synopsis: 3D sound spatialisation control and animation tool
